my raverly sprofile raincrochetplus i used dk weight acrylic yarn in 4 different colors but you can choose the kind of dk yarn you like most you can change colors in every round or use just one color there aren t rules i ve used 123 gr - 327 meters 358 yards it s ok to use a worsted yarn too materials 4 mm hook or any hooks to meet the gauge needle scissors tape measure stitch markers pattern is written in us crochet terms 10 cm x 10 cm/ 4 x 4 = 8 row chain 18 gauge row 1 double_crochet in the second chain from hook double_crochet 17 st row 2 chain 2 turn double_crochet until the end of the row 17 st row 3-8 repeat row 2 until you ll have 8 row 17 st the side of each square measures 15cm 6 granny balaclava pattern by ra in crochet 1 chain chain bpdc back post double_crochet abbreviations double_crochet double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch/stitches *----* repeat instructions from *to* as many times as stated rs right side ws wrong side this balaclava fits an adult but you can make any other sizes using smaller granny sizing squares the final width is approx 28cm 11 the final length is approx 40cm 16 this pattern is customizable and you
